tns:organisation.tns:name: Our Cooperative Organisation
tns:organisation.tns:description: An organisation that exists to provide work opportunities for its members.

tns:aim.tns:name: Provide existing work for all existing members.
tns:aim.tns:description:
The primary aim is to provide employment for members of the cooperative.
The cooperative model provides the flexibility to make this possible, in contrast to a profit maximising organisation.

tns:aim.tns:name: Provide work opportunities for new members.

tns:goal.tns:name: 24 hours of work per week minimum.
tns:goal.tns:description:
The objective of this goal is to allow a cooperative member to earn double the Newstart Allowance for the equivalent of 3 days work in a week.
The Newstart Allowance for a single person is $269.40 per week, so double that is $538.80 or $22.45 per hour for 24 hours (3 days * 8 hrs) effort.
The guaranteed minimum wage in Australia is presently $694.90 per week. This is equivalent to $17.37 per hour for 40 hours (5 days * 8 hrs) effort.

tns:task.tns:name: Gardening
tns:task.tns:description: All garden preparation, planting and tending of crops.

tns:subtask.tns:name: Thinning
tns:subtask.tns:description: Hand thinning of establised seedlings to optimal density.

tns:subtask.tns:name: Weeding
tns:subtask.tns:description: Removal of unwanted plant species, competing with crop species.

tns:subtask.tns:name: Watering
tns:subtask.tns:description: Maintenance of optimal soil moisture levels.

tns:subtask.tns:name: Pest and Disease Control
tns:subtask.tns:description: Wholistic management of insect pests and plant diseases.

tns:task.tns:name: Produce Harvest and Processing
tns:task.tns:description: Harvesting and processing of crops grown to marketable produce state.

tns:task.tns:name: Food Preparation
tns:task.tns:description: Value adding in kitchen facilities to saleable prepared and/or cooked foods .

tns:task.tns:name: Food Sales and Service
tns:task.tns:description: Selling grown produce and prepared foods, and other customer service at markets and eateries.

tns:goal.tns:name: Optional 6 months unpaid leave per year.
Mandatory 4 weeks paid leave per year.
